posts.text: Evernote Export body, td { font-family: 微软雅黑; font-size: 11pt; } 1、判断文件是否存在使用os模块中的os.path.exists()方法import osos.path.exists(test_file.txt)#Trueos.path.exists(no_exist_file.txt)#False2、判断文件夹是否存在也可以使用os.path.exists()方法import osos.path.exists(test_dir)#Trueos.path.exists(no_exist_dir)#False可见，使用os.path.exists()方法既可以判断文件，可以判断文件夹如果一个目录下既有文件，又有文件夹，且同名，可以用os.path.isfile()方法import osos.path.isfile("test-data")3、判断文件是否可以做读写操作使用os.access()方法来判断import osif os.access("/file/path/foo.txt", os.F_OK): print("Given file path is exist.")if os.access("/file/path/foo.txt", os.R_OK): print ("File is accessible to read")if os.access("/file/path/foo.txt", os.W_OK): print ("File is accessible to write")if os.access("/file/path/foo.txt", os.X_OK): print ("File is accessible to execute")os.F_OK：检查文件是否存在os.R_OK：可读os.W_OK：可写os.X_OK：可被执行 �

posts.title: Hello World
posts.text: Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub. Quick StartCreate a new post1$ hexo new "My New Post" More info: Writing Run server1$ hexo server More info: Server Generate static files1$ hexo generate More info: Generating Deploy to remote sites1$ hexo deploy More info: Deployment
